title: At Facebook, You Aren’t the Customer. You’re the Product
sub_head: Which may explain the lack of customer service.
body:
Regarding “Hello? Hello? Is This Facebook? Anybody There? (Nope.)” (Page One, May 24), I, too, had my account suspended. After weeks of trying to glean why, I finally gave up. The result? My days are longer and I am accomplishing more than I used to.
Alan Bergman
